thread.title: Michelle Obama’s Fashion Influence Won’t End When She Leaves the White House
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama’s Fashion Influence Won’t End When She Leaves the White House

author: Véronique Hyland
title: Michelle Obama’s Fashion Influence Won’t End When She Leaves the White House
text: There are plenty of substantive reasons to be experiencing pre-nostalgia for Michelle Obama ’s eight years as First Lady. Re-watch her stirring final speech last week in case you need further proof of that. But from a fashion standpoint, she’ll be missed not just for... More »
